#summary Papers about Native Client technology

We've published the following papers about Native Client technology:

  * [http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/native_client/data/docs_tarball/nacl/googleclient/native_client/documentation/nacl_paper.pdf Native Client: A Sandbox for Portable, Untrusted x86 Native Code], Appeared in the [http://oakland09.cs.virginia.edu 2009 IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy, May 2009]
  * [http://nativeclient.googlecode.com/svn/data/site/NaCl_SFI.pdf Adapting Software Fault Isolation to Contemporary CPU Architectures]. Appeared in the [http://www.usenix.org/events/sec10/index.html
19th USENIX Security Symposium], August 2010; originally posted February 2010, revised June 2010
  * [http://nativeclient.googlecode.com/svn/data/site/pnacl.pdf PNaCl: Portable Native Client Executables], white paper, February 2010
  * [http://naclports.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/experimental/v8/nacljit.pdf Language-Independent Sandboxing of Just-In-Time Compilation and Self-Modifying Code], to appear in the [http://pldi11.cs.utah.edu 
2011 Conference on Programming Language Design and Implementation].
